init.title: Voice Replay Configuration
init.description:
Configure all TTS settings in one place.

Engine: **{engine}**
Language: **{language}**
Available voices: **{voice_count}**
Available speakers: **{speaker_count}**

data_description.tts_engine: Select the TTS engine to use for voice playback. Choose 'Auto-detect' to automatically find an available engine.
data_description.tts_language: Select the language for text-to-speech output
data_description.tts_voice_combined: Choose a voice and speaker combination. Displays as 'Speaker Name (quality)' for easy selection.
data_description.sonos_announcement_mode: How to prepare Sonos speakers before TTS playback to prevent audio cutoff

error.voice_not_available: The selected voice is not available for this TTS engine. Please choose a different voice or check your TTS configuration.
error.speaker_not_available: The selected speaker is not available for this voice. Please choose a different voice-speaker combination.

replay.name: Replay
replay.description: Replay a previously captured voice clip or play provided audio data.
